name: The Hard Game (BlusparkGames)
description:
You control a little red square called Squaer. In each level, Squaer needs to collect all Coyns for the goal to turn green. Then, Squaer can proceed to the next level. However, it will not be easy (as the title suggests) because there will be many Cerculs to avoid along the way. On the positive side though, there are checkpoints.

Good luck!

Features:

  • 40 levels
  • 29 achievements
  • Checkpoints
  • Stats
  • WASD or arrow controls
  • Full screen toggle
  • Music/Sound effects toggle
  • Visual effects toggle
  • Secret level
